Academic.description: I am currently in the eighth semester at one of the top Universities in Latin America.
I am a student in the best online education platform in Latin America, expanding my knowledge in databases and soft skills.
Yep, I hardly got graduated from school.

experience.jobDescription: Led the product development and support team of the company.

I had the opportunity to participate as an educator in the area of ​​physics in the Sotavento popular education group, giving and supporting classes for young people and adults who aspired to access higher education.
I worked on the design and development of cross-platform Chatbots with Dialogflow from Google Cloud.
